snippet.title: Stray Blade Tokyo Game Show Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
Stray Blade Tokyo Game Show Trailer

Stray Blade is an action RPG with adventurous exploration coming to Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, EPIC Games, and Steam in 2023!

Embark on an unforgettable journey and discover the story of Acrea and its ancient legacy. Reveal the whole history that turned the peaceful valley into a place of war, death, and tales that have been passed down by the world’s greatest dynasties for centuries. Use this knowledge to destroy the relics of the past and restore peace in the war-torn valley.

You can now register for the Stray Blade Beta! This is your chance to be among the first to play Stray Blade. All Beta Testers will also be featured in the game credits! 

Register for the Stray Blade Beta here: https://505.games/SBBeta

Join the official Stray Blade community on Discord at https: http://505.games/SBDiscord

Visit the Stray Blade website for all other details: http://www.stray-blade.com

Wishlist Stray Blade on Steam today for game updates http://505.games/SBYouTube
